mapper.insert: INSERT INTO emp_attendance ( id, start_dtime, end_dtime, reg_dtime, mod_dtime, reg_id, mod_id ) VALUES ( #{id}, NOW(), NULL, NOW(), NOW(), #{id}, #{id} )
mapper.update: UPDATE emp_attendance SET end_dtime = NOW(), mod_dtime = NOW(), mod_id = #{id} WHERE id = #{id} AND DATE(start_dtime) = CURDATE() AND end_dtime IS NULL
